extensionDescription.message: Automatically detect and close duplicate browser tabs. Saves memory, reduces clutter. Works with tab suspender extensions.

statisticsNote.message: Statistics are updated in real-time as you browse. If you see "Tabs: 1" but have many tabs open, try refreshing this page or reloading the extension. This extension respects your privacy -

autoCloseDescription.message: Automatically close duplicate tabs as they are detected, without requiring manual intervention.

howItWorks.description: Subheading for how it works section

autoCloseWork1.message: Monitors tabs in real-time for duplicates
autoCloseWork1.description: Auto close how it works point 1

autoCloseWork2.message: Waits 2 seconds after detecting duplicates before closing (prevents rapid firing)
autoCloseWork2.description: Auto close how it works point 2

autoCloseWork3.message: Preserves active and pinned tabs automatically
autoCloseWork3.description: Auto close how it works point 3

autoCloseWork4.message: Works with suspended tabs from extensions like Marvellous Suspender
autoCloseWork4.description: Auto close how it works point 4

autoCloseBest1.message: Users who frequently open duplicate tabs accidentally

autoCloseBest2.message: Heavy tab users who want automatic cleanup

autoCloseBest3.message: Reducing manual maintenance of tab organization

currentWindowOnlyTitle.description: Title for current window only setting

currentWindowOnlyDescription.message: Limit duplicate detection and closing to tabs in the currently active browser window only.
currentWindowOnlyDescription.description: Description for current window only setting

currentWindowWork1.message: Only scans tabs in the window you're currently using
currentWindowWork1.description: Current window how it works point 1

currentWindowWork2.message: Ignores tabs in other browser windows
currentWindowWork2.description: Current window how it works point 2

currentWindowWork3.message: Badge count shows duplicates in current window only
currentWindowWork3.description: Current window how it works point 3

currentWindowWork4.message: Manual closing (Alt+Shift+D) affects current window only
currentWindowWork4.description: Current window how it works point 4

currentWindowBest1.message: Users who work with multiple browser windows

currentWindowBest3.message: Preventing accidental closure of tabs in other windows

sortTabsDescription.message: This setting sorts ALL tabs in each window alphabetically by URL, not just duplicates. It groups related tabs together and organizes your entire tab bar for better navigation.

sortTabsWork1.message: Sorts ALL tabs alphabetically by their URL (not just duplicates)
sortTabsWork1.description: Sort tabs how it works point 1

sortTabsWork2.message: Groups tabs from the same domain together
sortTabsWork2.description: Sort tabs how it works point 2

sortTabsWork3.message: Maintains window separation (sorts within each window)
sortTabsWork3.description: Sort tabs how it works point 3

sortTabsWork4.description: Sort tabs how it works point 4

sortTabsWork5.message: Happens every time you close duplicates
sortTabsWork5.description: Sort tabs how it works point 5

sortTabsBest1.message: Users who prefer organized, grouped tabs

settingsSaved.description: Success message when settings are saved

errorSavingSettings.description: Error message when saving settings fails

errorLoadingSettings.description: Error message when loading settings fails

tip1.message: Use Alt+Shift+D (or Option+Shift+D on Mac) to manually close duplicates

tip2.message: The extension badge shows the number of duplicate tabs detected

tip3.message: Active and pinned tabs are always preserved when closing duplicates

tip4.message: Works with tab suspender extensions like Marvellous Suspender

tip5.message: All processing happens locally - no data is sent to external servers

privacyAndSourceCode.description: Title for privacy and source code section

footerDescription.message: This extension is open source and respects your privacy. No data is collected or transmitted to external servers. All processing happens locally in your browser. View our privacy policy and source code for complete transparency.

noResultsFound.message: No matching domains or pages found
noResultsFound.description: Message when search returns no results
